casebody.data:
John GARCIA, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 6061. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 31, 1931. Rehearing Denied April 24, 1931. W. J. Waguespaek, of Now Orleans, La., for appellant. Edmond E. Talbot, U. S. Atty., and William H. Norman, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of New Orleans, La.

Before FOSTER, STBLEY, and HUT-CHESON, Cireuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment in this case is affirmed.
